Resistance.help: The Lich is resistant to Sleep and Fear. It is also resistant to Negative Energy, Toxic and Cold damage. The Lich can cast Dark Blast and Torrent.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Negative, Toxic, Cold
Resistance.targetHelp: Spirits are non corporeal and highly resistant to Immobilization smashing, lethal and negative energy damage. However, they are vulnerable to Energy and Psionic damage.
Resistance.targetShortHelp: Auto Res Smash, Lethal, Negative, Immobilize

Dark_Blast.help: The Dark Blast has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Torrent.help: The Torrent has reduced your chance to hit.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Tenebrous_Tentacles.help: The Tenebrous Tentacles are holding you immobile and reducing your chance to hit.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Life_Drain.help: The Ghost has drained your life to heal herself. Your chance to hit is reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: {PlayerSource} heals itself for {Damage} points of health.

Enchant.help: This Lich has been Enchanted. He can now cast Tenebrous Tentacles and Life Drain.

Fearsome_Stare.help: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your chance to hit.

Petrifying_Gaze.help: The Petrifying Gaze has stopped you in your tracks!
Petrifying_Gaze.victimHit: {PlayerSource} attempts to Hold you with a Petrifying Gaze.

Mode2.help: This Lich has been Empowered. He can now cast Fearsome Stare and Petrifying Gaze.

Empower.help: This Lich has been Empowered. He can now cast Fearsome Stare and Petrifying Gaze.
